title: Cat on a hot tin roof
creator_credit: Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer, Avon, Lawrence Weingarten and Richard Brooks
brief_description: A rich plantation owner, dying of cancer, finds his two sons unsatisfactory; one is a conniver, the other a neurotic who refuses to sleep with his wife. Stars Elizabeth Taylor, Paul Newman, Burl Ives. Adapted from the Tennessee Williams’ play.
